attr.title: Windmills
attr.desc: Master your combat techniques and explore a magic world in this combat-focused metroidvania. Help the unreliable narrator complete his story which changes depending on the player's actions.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo from Steam.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1803760/Windmills/) and copy all files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo from Steam.
